message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase my product. Given its value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $14,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it at this time. I hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Bob, I appreciate your offer and understand your perspective on the value.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to come down to $12,500. This price reflects the true worth of the product and its potential benefits for you.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand your position, I would like to propose $11,000 as a counteroffer. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise considering the value of the product.
